200.html:
data [required]

[object]

The list of due date rules.

attributes [required]

object

Attributes of a due date rule.

action

object

The action to apply for a due date rule.

due_time_per_severity

[object]

The due time per severity level.

severity [required]

string

The severity level.

time [required]

string

The due time duration in ISO 8601 duration format.

notify_before_due

string

The duration before the due date to send a notification, in ISO 8601 duration format.

reason_description

string

A description of the reason for the action.

created_at [required]

int64

The Unix timestamp of when the rule was created.

created_by [required]

object

Information about a user.

handle [required]

string

The handle of the user.

name [required]

string

The name of the user.

enabled [required]

boolean

Whether the rule is enabled.

modified_at [required]

int64

The Unix timestamp of when the rule was last modified.

modified_by [required]

object

Information about a user.

handle [required]

string

The handle of the user.

name [required]

string

The name of the user.

name [required]

string

The name of the due date rule.

rule [required]

object

The conditions that define which security issues a rule applies to.

evp_v2_query

string

A v2 query string for filtering security issues.

is_v2_source_of_truth

boolean

Whether the v2 query is the source of truth.

issue_type

string

The type of security issue.

query

string

A legacy query string for filtering security issues.

rule_ids

[string]

The specific rule IDs that match the condition.

rule_types

[string]

The types of rules that match the condition.

severities

[string]

The severity levels that match the condition.

user_query

string

A user-friendly query string for filtering security issues.

id [required]

uuid

The unique identifier of the due date rule.

type [required]

enum

The type of the due date rule resource. Allowed enum values: due_date_rules
